name: Baratrum
description:
~I put my trust in you, little Demon~

Vaistas – a higher plantdemon is on her way to the King of the Firehell to bring him some medicine. The King posessed a sick Human and caught himself a disease. Now he is angry and ashamed for his own weak Body. He demands the immediate delivery of medicine, which can only be produced in the Planthell. If he doesnt get the medicine without delay he will burn the whole Planthell to ashes, he threatens

 

Past magma lakes and fireballs, Vaistas is on her way to the mighty tower of the sick demonking to save her race and her home

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
P - Pausemenu

Left Joystick - Movement
South Button - Jump
Gamepad Special Right - Pausemenu

Credits:
